snippet: The alert came hours after American officials evacuated the consulate in Lahore, Pakistan, also on security fears.
abstract: Pakistani security forces are on high alert for possible militant attack after intercepting threats against major military installations; alert comes hours after American officials evacuated the consulate in Lahore, also on security fears.

byline.original: By SALMAN MASOOD and DECLAN WALSH
byline.contributor: Salman Masood reported from Islamabad, and Declan Walsh from London.

lead_paragraph: The alert came hours after American officials evacuated the consulate in Lahore, Pakistan, also on security fears.

headline.main: Pakistan on High Alert After Intercepting Threats to Military Sites
headline.print_headline: Pakistan on High Alert After Intercepting Threats to Military Sites
